select t.task_no,t.objid,t.cmd_type,t.sloc_no,t.eloc_no,t.transfer_type,t.transfer_no,t.pallet_no,t.finish_status,t.cmd_step,t5.order_no,t5.line_id, t.creation_date,t.excute_date,t.finish_date, t.sloc_plc_no,t.eloc_plc_no,t.err_no,t.err_name, t2.fmem,t3.mater_type,t4.transfer_type_name from WBS_TASK_CMD t LEFT JOIN wbs_task t1 ON t.task_guid = t1.task_guid LEFT JOIN PSB_ROUTE t2 ON t.route_no = t2.route_no LEFT JOIN PSB_MATERIAL t3 ON t.product_no = t3.mater_no LEFT JOIN PSB_TRANSFER_TYPE t4 ON t.transfer_type = t4.transfer_type_no LEFT JOIN wbs_order_line t5 ON t.order_line_guid = t5.order_line_guid where t4.transfer_type_no='40'
T.OBJID LIKE '%'||#where.OBJID#||'%'
T.TASK_NO LIKE '%'||#where.TASK_NO#||'%'
T.CMD_TYPE LIKE '%'||#where.CMD_TYPE#||'%'
ORDER BY t.OBJID
